name: 9th.js
description: A modern 3D JavaScript library for creating interactive graphics and visualizations

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:all && npm run build:types
scripts.clean: if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist && if exist dist-cjs rmdir /s /q dist-cjs && if exist dist-esm rmdir /s /q dist-esm && if exist dist-umd rmdir /s /q dist-umd || rm -rf dist dist-cjs dist-esm dist-umd
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:performance && npm run test:visual && npm run test:load
scripts.validate: npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.release:alpha: npm version prerelease --preid=alpha && npm publish --tag alpha
scripts.release:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.release:rc: npm version prerelease --preid=rc && npm publish --tag next
scripts.channel:build:all: npm run channel:build:core && npm run channel:build:full && npm run channel:build:module && npm run channel:build:experimental
scripts.channel:test:all: npm run channel:test:core && npm run channel:test:full && npm run channel:test:module && npm run channel:test:experimental
scripts.channel:dev:all: concurrently "npm run channel:dev:core" "npm run channel:dev:full" "npm run channel:dev:module" "npm run channel:dev:experimental"
scripts.channel:publish:all: npm run channel:publish:core && npm run channel:publish:full && npm run channel:publish:module && npm run channel:publish:experimental
scripts.channel:analyze:sizes: npm run build && npm run size:core && npm run size:full && npm run size:module && npm run size:experimental
scripts.size:core: npm run build:core && npx vite-bundle-analyzer dist/core/**/*.js
scripts.size:full: npm run build:full && npx vite-bundle-analyzer dist/full/**/*.js
scripts.size:module: npm run build:module && npx vite-bundle-analyzer dist/module/**/*.js
scripts.size:experimental: npm run build:experimental && npx vite-bundle-analyzer dist/experimental/**/*.js
scripts.channel:validate:all: npm run channel:validate:core && npm run channel:validate:full && npm run channel:validate:module && npm run channel:validate:experimental
scripts.channel:release: npm run channel:sync:versions && npm run channel:validate:all && npm run channel:build:all && npm run channel:analyze:sizes && npm run channel:publish:all
scripts.channel:release:core: npm run channel:validate:core && npm run channel:build:core && npm run channel:publish:core
scripts.channel:release:full: npm run channel:validate:full && npm run channel:build:full && npm run channel:publish:full
scripts.channel:release:module: npm run channel:validate:module && npm run channel:build:module && npm run channel:publish:module
scripts.channel:release:experimental: npm run channel:validate:experimental && npm run channel:build:experimental && npm run channel:publish:experimental
